# PR: Micro Growth Change

Purpose
- What small, reviewable improvement does this PR deliver in a single step?

Checklist
- [ ] Single-purpose, minimal diff
- [ ] No secrets/keys in code or logs
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md (brief line)
- [ ] If files/flows changed, updated docs (README/AGENTS/HEARTBEAT as needed)
- [ ] CI passes locally (if applicable)

Impact
- Why this matters for speed, reliability, or growth

Testing Notes
- How to verify quickly (commands, pages, or log lines)

Follow-ups (Optional)
- Next 1-2 bite-size steps (not included here)
